news: [Release v0.80] Test all parameters, Parse forms and Csrf tokens, Databases: CockroachDB Mckoi Neo4j NuoDB Hana and Vertica, Translation complete: Russian, Chinese.
[Roadmap] Burp integration, Crawler, Tampering, Dump to a file, Full Path Disclosure, WAF detection.
[In progress] SQL Structure: Dump In One Shot and Zipped, Database: Couchbase, Inject rows by range, User Agent configuration.

[Feature] Help the community and translate jSQL into your language. Click on the top right button to show the advanced settings and open menu Community, choose a language using 'I help translate jSQL' and translate some text then click on Send. Your translation will be integrated to the next release by the developer.
